text: Oleg Borisovich Vidov (; June 11, 1943 - May 15, 2017) was a Soviet-American actor, movie director and producer. He appeared in 50 movies from 1961 until his retirement in 2014. He was born in Filimonki, Russian SFSR, Soviet Union. He was known for his roles in Red Heat, Wild Orchid, and in The Immortals.
